Package main.java

Interface Network

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bus, Mesh, Torus

    interface Network
    Network object that handles the interactions between Routers

      • createRouterArray

        Router[] createRouterArray​(int inputNodes)
        Creates an array of Router objects
        Parameters:
        inputNodes - The number of routers to create
        Returns:
        The array of router objects

      • generatePacket

        void generatePacket​(double chance)
        Sometimes generates a packet with a random number of flits and with a random destination, then inputs the packet to a random router
        Parameters:
        chance - The chance that a packet will be created

      • createPacket

        Flit[] createPacket​(int numberOfFlits,
                    int locX,
                    int locY,
                    int destX,
                    int destY)
        Creates a packet (which is an array of flits)
        Parameters:
        numberOfFlits - The number of flits that the packet will be made out of
        locX - The X location of the flit
        locY - The Y location of the flit
        destX - The X destination of the flit
        destY - The Y destination of the flit
        Returns:
        An array of flits

      • drawTopology

        Draws the topology for the network
        Returns:
        A JPanel with the drawn topology
